Title: Dracothian Guard Desolators
Legend: To the Desolators falls the honour of eradicating the enemies of the Extremis chambers. Neither they nor their Dracoths heed any desperate calls for mercy, and their thunderaxes take a fearsome toll with each swing.

PitchBattleProfile.Notes: Battleline in a Hammers of Sigmar army

Intro: Each model in a Dracothian Guard Desolators unit is armed with a Thunderaxe.

Rules.Name: Battalions
Rules.Rule: BATTALIONS: This warscroll can be used in the following warscroll battalions: • Thunderwave Echelon

Rules.Name: Elite
Rules.Rule: ELITE: Models in this unit can issue commands to their own unit.

Rules.Name: Mount
Rules.Rule: MOUNT: This unit’s Dracoths are each armed with a Stormblast and Claws and Fangs.

Rules.Name: Stormblast
Rules.Fluff: Dracoths can unleash the power of Sigmar’s storm from within their maws.
Rules.Rule: Do not use the attack sequence for an attack made with a Stormblast. Instead, roll a dice. On a 4+, the target suffers D3 mortal wounds.

Rules.Name: Cleaving Blow
Rules.Fluff: A single swing of a thunderaxe can carve through several foes.
Rules.Rule: Add 2 to the Attacks characteristic of a Thunderaxe if the number of models in the target unit is greater than the number of models in this unit.
